product_name: Garmin VIRB Auto Dash Suction Mount
long_description: Keep your Garmin VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera rolling even while driving with the Garmin VIRB Auto Dash suction mount. It attaches to a windshield or any smooth, flat surface. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: Keep your Garmin VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera rolling even while driving with the Garmin VIRB Auto Dash suction mount. It attaches to a windshield or any smooth, flat surface.
